ethos.title: Our Code
ethos.definition: State of mind of someone who is searching for themselves, who fights daily to make it through, no matter the means

craft.title: Craft
craft.description: Meticulous attention to detail in every composition, production, and performance. We honor the art of sound design.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building connections through music. We foster a space where artists and listeners come together as one.

continuum.title: Continuum
continuum.description: Evolving while staying true to our roots. We bridge past and future, tradition and innovation.

footer.manifesto: 241 x 225. A music collective pushing boundaries and creating sounds that resonates with the African Diaspora. Crafting experiences that move both body and soul.
